detail_description: Lithies Taverna in the countryside offers an enchanting ambiance and is worth visiting multiple times. The menu boasts fresh, organic, and delectable dishes. Charming tables with checkered tablecloths are scattered beneath a stunning leafy arbor. The restaurant's attention to detail is evident in the charming earthenware jugs used for serving house wine and the complimentary fruit from their trees included with the bill. Be sure to try their exceptional whole roasted sea bass.
name: Lithies Taverna

detail_description: Nestled on a hillside overlooking the stunning Ionian Sea, Cave Damianos Restaurant offers an unforgettable dining experience that beautifully marries local flavors with breathtaking scenery. Located near the charming village of Agalas, this eatery is renowned for its simple yet elegantly presented dishes made from fresh ingredients. Guests can savor their meals while soaking in panoramic views that stretch down to the tranquil blue waters below.
name: Cave Damianos Restaurant

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Zakynthos, Prosilio Restaurant is a modern dining spot that offers a new gastronomical experience to the island. Chef Kristy Karageorgou and sommelier Yiorgos Kampitsis have curated a menu featuring unexpected ingredients and original combinations.
name: Prosilio Restaurant

detail_description: Yard of Taste in Zakynthos Town offers a stylish menu with organic, gluten-free, and vegan options. The ambiance is described as a mix of Cath Kidston and beach hut vibes. The restaurant is known for its popular brunch and delicious feta in an oat crust, along with a variety of excellent Greek pasta dishes and succulent chops for dinner. The staff is friendly and passionate about explaining local dishes. Overall, it's a great place to enjoy flavorful food in a charming setting.
name: Yard of Taste

detail_description: Located in the serene village of Akrotiri, Bassia - Η Μπασία Restaurant offers a great dining experience with its spectacular elevated views and seafood-heavy menu featuring sea bass, lobster pasta, and steamed mussels. The setting is exquisite, allowing guests to enjoy the stunning sunset over the sea while indulging in Mediterranean favorites. While some find the service a bit aloof, the overall ambience and food presentation receive high praise.
name: Bassia - Η Μπασία Restaurant

detail_description: The greek restaurant Porto Limnionas Tavern has a rustic feel, with its red roof-tiled houses clustered around a stocky 14th-century church, and offers delicious seafood.
name: Porto Limnionas Tavern

detail_description: Ampelostrates is a charming farm restaurant located near the quaint village of Koiliomenos, owned by the Maroudas family. The rustic ambiance and picturesque setting amidst fruit orchards and walnut trees create a captivating dining experience. Antonis, the owner, crafts traditional local dishes using his own farm produce, foraged items, and locally sourced ingredients.
name: Ampelostrátes

detail_description: Votsalo Taverna is a hidden gem nestled amidst olive groves, offering breathtaking views of Marathoni island where endangered Caretta-Caretta turtles breed. The decor is quirky with crazy paved pillars and ropes hanging from the ceiling, but the real highlight is the spectacular sea views. The small menu features delectable seafood dishes such as crunchy shrimp fishcakes, grilled squid on skewers, and fresh octopus with lightly seasoned pasta.
name: Votsalo Taverna

detail_description: Taverna Varkarola is a family-run restaurant in Zante, Greece, known for serving the best pita gyros on the island. The restaurant has a cozy and well-decorated ambiance with friendly and knowledgeable staff. The menu offers unique and carefully prepared dishes that are above the average standard of restaurants in Zante. The quality of food is superior, featuring excellent cheeses and traditional Greek flavors.
name: Taverna Varkarola - Zakynthian Serenades

detail_description: Nestled along the stunning coastline of Argassi Village, Utopia Resto is a culinary gem that promises an unforgettable dining experience. With its elegant and romantic atmosphere, this restaurant is perfect for those looking to enjoy a meal while soaking in breathtaking sunset views. Guests can indulge in a modern twist on traditional Greek cuisine, featuring fresh seasonal ingredients sourced from their own greenhouse. For those who prefer lighter fare, Utopia Meze & Bar offers delightful cocktails paired with small plates.
name: Utopia Resto

detail_description: Zakanthi is a laid-back bar located in the serene seaside resort of Kalamaki. The bar is housed in a charming ochre building with olive green shutters and features a beautiful garden with manicured lawns, palm trees, and potted plants, creating a private and tranquil ambiance. Inside, the rustic-cosy interiors boast stone floors, wooden tables, and candlelight.
name: Zakanthi

detail_description: Perched on the cliffs near Keri village in Zakynthos, the Keri Lighthouse Restaurant offers breathtaking views of the Ionian Sea and the Keri Caves and Cliffs. The restaurant's terrace provides a romantic setting to enjoy stunning sunsets over the deep blue sea. Visitors can capture memorable photos against the backdrop of vibrant sunsets and admire the two huge rock cones, known as Mizitres, flanked by a deserted island rising from the blue sea.
name: Keri Lighthouse Restaurant

detail_description: Nestled in the picturesque Tragaki area, just a stone's throw from Tsilivi, Gaidaros Beach Bar offers an idyllic escape with its sandy shores and lush greenery. This charming spot is perfect for families, as the shallow waters ensure a safe environment for children to splash around. The beach itself has historical significance, named after the donkeys that once roamed here.
name: Gaidaros Beach Bar

detail_description: Malanos restaurant in Zakynthos offers a unique dining experience with its hushed atmosphere and relaxed service. Despite being a bit hidden, it's considered a great value for money taverna. The owner, Nikos, warmly welcomes guests and even invites them into the kitchen to see off-menu specials, adding a personal touch to the experience. The comfortable covered outdoor seating area provides the perfect setting for enjoying fresh and flavorful food, although some menu items may be unavailable if they run out during lunch.
name: Malanos restaurant

detail_description: Ammos Taverna is a seafood and Mediterranean grill restaurant situated on the seafront of Zakynthos Town. It offers traditional local dishes made with high-quality ingredients, including fresh daily-caught fish. The restaurant is known for its grilled sea bream, seafood pasta, and mussels saganaki, which are popular among both locals and tourists. With its enviable location near the harbor, patrons can enjoy fresh and home-cooked food while taking in beautiful views.
name: Ammos Tavern

detail_description: Stathmos, located in Zante's old Chora bus station, may not seem like much at first glance, but it is a beloved sidewalk cafe known for its authentic Greek cuisine. The restaurant offers traditional dishes such as kouneli stifado (rabbit stew) and salted cod with skordalia. Visitors can also enjoy classic favorites like moussaka and pork souvlaki, all served in generous portions.
name: Stathmos

detail_description: If you're on the hunt for authentic Italian cuisine in Laganas, look no further than Bonanza. This charming eatery is renowned for its homemade pizzas that truly stand out, alongside a delightful selection of pastas—all offered at incredibly affordable prices. It's no wonder that Bonanza consistently ranks among the top dining spots in Zante. Plus, if you have an Uncharted Zante wristband, be sure to flash it for some fantastic discounts!
name: Bonanza

detail_description: Komis Fish Tavern is a renowned and award-winning eatery that has gained national and international acclaim. It's known for its exceptional seafood, wide variety of salads, fresh vegetables, and vegetarian dishes. The tavern remains true to its roots by sourcing daily caught fish from local fishermen and using seasonal Zakynthian ingredients. Despite its unassuming location in Zakynthos port, the restaurant offers a delightful dining experience with stunning views of the sapphire waters.
name: Komis Fish Tavern

detail_description: Diachronikó, a timeless Greek tavern owned by a reputable family, offers delectable dishes prepared with ingredients sourced from their own gardens. From the flavorful Asimina tomatoes to the succulent lamb in dishes like parchment-baked kleftiko, every component used in their stewed and roasted creations is cultivated on the Plessas family's farm.
name: Diachroniko
